bug.author: RasmusEdvardsen
bug.summary: Exporting tasks with multiple completions in CONLL2003 format
bug.description:
Describe the bug Unsure if this is a bug or a feature request. I am trying to export tasks in conll2003 format. Some tasks have several completions. When I export, a 500 error occurred, and an error (or explanation) is thrown about the fact that exporting tasks with multiple completions is not supported. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Create a new label studio project Annotate a task Annotate the same task again Try to export with CONLL2003 format
Expected behavior A conll2003 formatted file is downloaded
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15195622/87772049-7cb60100-c821-11ea-913a-dfa9731ba3d2.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
EDIT: Nevermind, it still throws an error, like so: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15195622/87780069-36b36a00-c82e-11ea-97e9-656b1a81b8d6.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
When I try to run this conversion locally, it works with several completions, btw:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio-converter>label-studio-convert repo</denchmark-link>
This issue is in the label-studio-converter.
